title: Look & Lease Special Selected 2BR, High Floor!   | Tour The Civic!
posting_body: ['Welcome to The Civic!', 'Selective Look and Lease Special - Ask For Details - Schedule Your Tour Today!', '2 bed / 2 bath / 941 Sq.', 'Ft.', '* Unit 1212 - Available', 'Now', '* Base Rent $4,616/mo.', '3D Virtual Tour of Floorplan:', '<URL>', 'The Civic', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Address:', '101 Polk St San Francisco, CA 94102', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'Property Description', 'Find a home inside this two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment for rent at The Civic!', 'The kitchen includes quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, and self-closing drawers!', 'This GreenPoint-certified community has amenities such as a fitness center and a roof deck.', 'Also featured are cascading roof decks with a 16 ft. long fire table, and a gourmet outdoor grilling kitchen.', 'Experience the culture of San Francisco by dining in one of the areas exquisite restaurants, going to a show, or visiting the museum.', 'This location is ideal for the commuter as The Civic is near bike routes and 38 different transit lines.', 'We are now open for tours!', 'Call us today to schedule your appointment!', 'Lease Terms:', '12-15 Month Leases (rates fluctuate)', 'Parking:', 'Type', '- Garage Lot', 'Fee', '- $350.00', 'Garage Stackers', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cat, Dog s are allowed.', 'We welcome 2 pets per home.', 'There is a $500 Pet Deposit.', 'Aggressive breeds are prohibited.', 'Please call our office for more details.', 'Building Type:', 'High Rise', 'Year Built:', '2015', 'Units:', '162', 'Office Hours', 'Monday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Tuesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Wednesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Thursday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Friday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Saturday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Sunday', ':\u2002\u2002 Closed', 'Management Company:', 'Emerald Fund, Inc.', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
